saveProperties(Properties, String) - Static method in class suncertify.utils.Utilities

search(String[]) - Method in class suncertify.gui.Controller
Returns the RecordTableModel containing all records that met the search criteria.
ServerGui - Class in suncertify.gui
This class represents the Gui window in which the user interacts when he launches the application in the server mode.
ServerGui() - Constructor for class suncertify.gui.ServerGui
Creates the structure of the server gui window and displays it on the screen.
ServerStarter - Class in suncertify.network
The objects from this class start the server which accepts network connections via RMI.
ServerStarter(ConfigOptions) - Constructor for class suncertify.network.ServerStarter
Creates an instance of the ServerStarter class using the configuration options specified as input parameter.
set(int, String) - Method in class suncertify.db.Record
Sets the current record with value in the index position.
setDbPath(String) - Method in class suncertify.gui.ConfigOptions
Sets the location of the database to the given path.
setDeleted(boolean) - Method in class suncertify.db.Record
Set the record as being deleted(true) or not (false).
setPort(String) - Method in class suncertify.gui.ConfigOptions
Sets the port number with the given port value.
setProperty(String, Object) - Method in class suncertify.utils.PropertyHelper
Sets the value to which the specified String key is to be mapped.
setValueAt(Object, int, int) - Method in class suncertify.gui.RecordTableModel
 
showMessageDialog(JFrame, GuiException) - Method in class suncertify.gui.CommonGui
This method creates a message dialog to be displayed in the frame passed as argument and with the title, message and message type extracted from the GuiException object.
start(JLabel) - Method in class suncertify.network.ServerStarter
This method starts the server that accepts RMI connections and updates the statusLabel during its process.
